text: Villefranche is a commune in the Gers department. It is in southwestern France. Today, it is a rural community. 138 people lived there in 2020. It started as a bastide in the 13th century. Unlike other bastides, the houses were built of clay. == Related pages == * Communes of the Gers department Category:Communes in Gers
title: Villefranche, Gers
